mapper.select: SELECT c.id,u.account,c.commentTime,c.content,c.star from order_tb o,comment_tb c,packagetype_tb pt,package_tb p,user_tb u where o.id=c.orderId AND u.id=c.userId AND o.packageServiceId=p.id AND p.packageTypeId=pt.id AND pt.id=#{_parameter}

SELECT COUNT(o.id) as orderCnt,SUM(c.star) as sumStar from order_tb o,comment_tb c,packagetype_tb pt,package_tb p where o.id=c.orderId AND o.packageServiceId=p.id AND p.packageTypeId=pt.id AND o.isComment=#{isComment} AND pt.id=#{typeId}

SELECT o.id,o.workerId,w.`name` as workerName,w.phone, o.packageServiceId,p.packageServiceName,p.packageServicePrice ,p.packageServiceDesc,o.serviceAddressId,o.isUseVoucher,o.state,o.isComment,o.price ,o.sumPrice,o.orderName,o.serviceTime,o.additionalRequirements,o.updateTime,o.createDate from order_tb o,worker_tb w,package_tb p WHERE o.workerId=w.id AND o.packageServiceId=p.id AND o.id=#{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT into user_tb(account, password, registDate, nickName, icon, email, address) VALUES(#{account},#{password},#{registDate},#{nickName},#{icon},#{email},#{address})
mapper.update:
update user_tb
nickName=#{nickName},
email=#{email},
icon=#{icon},
address=#{address},
birthday=#{birthday},
pwdAnswer=#{pwdAnswer},
password=#{pwd},
id =#{id}
where id=#{id}

update address_tb
reservation=#{reservation},
phone=#{phone},
districtInformation=#{districtInformation},
address=#{address},
idDefaultServiceAddress=#{idDefaultServiceAddress},
id =#{id}
where id=#{id}
update address_tb set idDefaultServiceAddress=0 where userId=#{_parameter}
